code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Header from"../components/layout/header";import Footer from"../components/layout/footer";import"../styles/app.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WorkerSignup=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[document,setDocument]=useState(null);const[location,setLocation]=useState("");const[jobDescription,setJobDescription]=useState("");const handleDocumentUpload=e=>{setDocument(e.target.files[0]);};const handleSignup=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert("Worker account created successfully!");navigate("/login");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{hideExtras:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sign Up as a Worker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSignup,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Full Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Describe your work experience",value:jobDescription,onChange:e=>setJobDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter your location",value:location,onChange:e=>setLocation(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:".pdf,.jpg,.png",onChange:handleDocumentUpload,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Worker Account"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default WorkerSignup;
